issues.description: The constructor in the solution repository declares its parameters in the order (lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents), but the UML and problem statement require the order to be (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors). This mismatch will confuse students and cause tests that expect the UML order to fail.
issues.suggested_fix: Reorder the constructor parameters in Lecture.java to match the UML: (String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors), and update the assignment order accordingly.
